text: The men's 400 metres hurdles event at the 1999 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Göteborg, Sweden, at Ullevi on 29 and 30 July 1999. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Thomas Goller ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Boris Gorban ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Periklis Iakovakis ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 30 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
